title: Has Alphabet Turned Into a Warren Buffett Stock?
text: Founded in 1993, The Motley Fool is a financial services company dedicated to making the world smarter, happier, and richer. Learn More In this video, I will talk about Alphabet (GOOG 0.21%) (GOOGL 0.04%) and why it gets the cheapest forward multiple out of the Magnificent Seven stocks. I will also go over a couple of key points from its latest earnings report and call. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Feb. 2, 2024. The video was published on Feb. 4, 2024. Suzanne Frey, an executive at Alphabet, is a member of The Motley Fool's board of directors. Neil Rozenbaum has no position in any of the stocks mentioned.
